metadata.title: Environmentally Sensitive Areas - PWS

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Hazardous Materials Response Assessment Division

metadata.description: Data Type: Exxon Valdez Oil Spill;  This is a series of four seasonal maps with a broad overview of the environmentally sensitive resources of Prince William Sound that would receive priority attention during oil spill planning and response. Resources depicted were chosen on the basis of high sensitivity to spilled oil, high vulnerability to oil spills or special management status. Also a series of 42 maps at 1:63360 with similar data.
metadata.notes:

Status: Complete

Access constraints: Seasonal maps are available to the public free of charge, 1:63,360 maps are available but are very limited production. Maps can be copied.

Use constraints: Not to be used for navigational purposes.
